pages.text: In an experiment to try controlling time, I managed to create a sigil that instead locally speeds up time for a single block. This is incredibly powerful, but comes at a cost. The sigil must charge up first, gaining charge slowly while in contact with a living being. There does not seem to be a limit to how much temporal energy the sigil can store, but my testing has been limited.
I should take care to not speed up anything that could cause catastrophic failures, as I would rather not be blown up.
